messages.message:
I'm not at all familiar with Emerson, but if we can use tesseract on each of these texboxes parallely then then we can achieve the below results, which I think is great.
Problem is it's time costly to use tesseract bluntly like this. Can take 10 seconds per ID

this looks amazing. do you want to talk sometime either today or tomorrow (should be pretty late over there now haha) and get this incorporated as the text detector for emerson and just see whether itâ€™s able to extract the spaces as well?
Would love to talk about it today @Jonathan Shih, just call me whenever you're free. I'm a night owl. Also if possible can you give me high level overview of how is Emerson built ?
